title: Education for Strengthening University Research Information Utilization Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience in information retrieval
context.additional_context: Social domain job-linked education for current professionals, a blended learning program conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain how to effectively search university research databases and OER (Open Educational Resources).
Learners can identify fake news and algorithmic bias by applying information credibility evaluation criteria.
Learners can collaboratively conduct information-gathering, analysis, and application projects based on research topics.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
